column5:
I wish we could live close so we could played video games. I feel u. 

I feel lonely even without quarantine.

Don't feel like someone's gonna read this but I feel the same way. And it scares me sometimes because I don't feel like talking 2 someone else about it is going to help me. I trust people and they broke me in so many levels. I feel like my head is a mess and it is the worst place for me 2 be in it. But I do pray and hope for others with this feeling to actually learn how to go on and live in peace.
